There are two ways to register yourself into Accounting Service :
documents.s: Steps to Register into Accounting Service

documents.t: Authenticate yourself First you need to authenticate yourself to EOSC Core Infrastructure Proxy. Instructions are provided here. Once you gain an access token, copy it. Register yourself Then you need to apply a request to the Accounting Service API, in order to register yourself. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.
Just log in to Accounting User Interface.
Once you register the Accounting Service, you can perform the following actions:

Choose your preferred way User Interface HTTP Request View Metric Definitions on website. All users, with roles, can display all the Metric Definitions, existing in the Accounting Service. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.

Choose your preferred way User Interface HTTP Request View Providers on website. You can read the Providers available on the EOSC Resource Catalogue and the ones registered through the Accounting Service API. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.

Choose your preferred way User Interface HTTP Request View Unit Types on website. You can read all the Unit Types registered to Accounting Service. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.

Choose your preferred way User Interface HTTP Request View Metric Types on website. You can read all the Metric Types registered to Accounting Service. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.

Choose your preferred way User Interface HTTP Request It's currently under development. You can read all the Clients registered to Accounting Service. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here.

This is a guide that refers to a Metric Definition. A Metric Definition is the way to represent and describe the type of the metrics. A Metric Definition consists of the metadata describing a Metric. If you are registered on Accounting System, via this guide you can see all the options you have to act,on Metric Definitions.
You can manage Metric Definitions. 1. Register to Accounting Service.
Details Any user,registered to Accounting System, can access the Metric Definitions that exist in Accounting Service. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here
documents.s: FETCH all Metric Definitions, existing in Accounting Service

documents.t: Details Any user,registered to Accounting System, can get the details of a specific Metric Definition , existing in the accounting system. Apply a request to the api. For more details, how to syntax the request, see here
Details If a project_admin role is assigned to you,you can create a Metric Definition. Apply a request to the api. For more details ,how to syntax the request, see here

Details If a project_admin role is assigned to you and you are the creator of the Metric Definition,you can update it. Apply a request to the api. For more details ,how to syntax the request, see here
Details If a project_admin role is assigned to you and you are the creator of the Metric Definition,you can delete it. Apply a request to the api. For more details,how to syntax the request, see here

Details Any user, registered to Accounting System,can search for specific Metric Definition/Metric Definitions,that match one or more criteria.You can define search criteria, on each field of the Metric Definition Collection or a combination of search criteria on more than one fields.You can search by Metric Definition's unit type, metric type, metric name, metric description or a combination of them. Apply a request to the Accounting Service API.You need to provide the search criteria in a specific syntax. For more details,how to syntax the request,see here.

To manage the Metric Definitions via a website, please visit the Metric Definition tab on the Accounting User Interface. Please note that all available actions are described in this section. The role that the client has obtained may not grant them access to some or all actions. Please refer to Metric Definition collection for more details.
To view all the Metric Definitions, you should visit the Metric Definition tab on the Accounting User Interface. Then, all the created Metric Definitions by any client are displayed.

To create a new Metric Definition click the Add a new Metric Definition button. Fill in the form with your preferred values and click the Submit button. If the Metric Definition is successfully created, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on a Metric Definition you want to update. Change the values that you want and click the Submit button. If the Metric Definition is successfully updated, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on a Metric Definition you want to delete. To delete the chosen Metric Definition click the Delete Metric Definition button. If the Metric Definition is successfully deleted, the following message is displayed.

In the Installations tab, you can find all the Installations associated with a Project, and you have been granted rights to them either as Project Admin, Provider Admin or Installation Admin. Please refer to Installation collection for more details.
To view all the Installation you have access to, you should visit the Installation tab on the Accounting User Interface. Then, all the aforementioned Installation are displayed.
documents.s: View all the Installations you have access to

documents.t: Click the Add a new Installation button to insert a new Installation. Choose the Project and Provider you want to insert a new Installation, fill in the rest form with your preferred values and click the Submit button. If the Installation is successfully created, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on an Installation you want to update. Change the values that you want and click the Submit button. If the Installation is successfully updated, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on an Installation you want to delete. To delete the chosen Installation click the Delete Installation button. If the Installation is successfully deleted, the following message is displayed.
You can collect all Metrics under a specific Installation by clicking on the highlighted button. Then, the Metrics belonging to the selected Installation are displayed.

As mentioned in the previous section, the Installation Metrics are displayed by selecting the highlighted button. You can manage all Installation Metrics and create new ones in this tab. Add a new Metric​ Click the Add Metric button to insert a new Metric to the selected Installation. Update an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to edit. Delete an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to delete.
In the My Providers tab, you can find all the Providers associated with a Project, and you have been granted rights to them either as Project Admin or Provider Admin.
To view all the Providers you have access to, you should visit the My Providers tab on the Accounting User Interface. Then, all the aforementioned Providers are displayed.
documents.s: View all the Providers you have access to

documents.t: You can collect all Metrics under a specific Provider by clicking on the highlighted button. Then, the Metrics belonging to the selected Provider are displayed.

As mentioned in the previous section, the Provider Metrics are displayed by selecting the highlighted button. You can manage all Provider Metrics and create new ones in this tab. Add a new Metric​ Click the Add Metric button to insert a new Metric to the selected Provider. Update an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to edit. Delete an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to delete.
In the Project tab, you can find all the Projects in which you have been granted rights to them as a Project Admin. Please refer to Project collection for more details.
To view all the Projects that have been assigned to you, you should visit the Project tab on the Accounting User Interface. Then, all the aforementioned Projects are displayed.
documents.s: View all the Projects that have been assigned to you

documents.t: Click the highlighted button on a Project you want to associate a Provider with. Select your preferred Providers from the drop-down list and click the Submit button. If the operation is completed without issues, the following message is displayed.
documents.s: Associate Providers with a specific Project

documents.t: Click the highlighted button on a Project you want to dissociate one or more Providers from. Select one or more Providers you want to dissociate from the Project and click the Submit button. If the operation is completed without issues, the following message is displayed.
documents.s: Dissociate Providers from a specific Project

documents.t: You can collect all Metrics under a specific Project by clicking on the highlighted button. Then, the assigned Metrics are displayed.

As mentioned in the previous section, the Project Metrics are displayed by selecting the highlighted button. You can manage all Project Metrics and create new ones in this tab. Add a new Metric​ Click the Add Metric button to insert a new Metric to the selected Project. Update an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to edit. Delete an existing Metric​ Click the highlighted button on a Metric you want to delete.

In the Provider tab, you can find all the Providers registered from the EOSC Resource Catalogue and the Accounting Service. Please note that all available actions are described in this section. To view all the registered Providers, you should visit the Providers tab on the Accounting User Interface. Then, all the registered Providers by any client are displayed.
You can view more information about a particular Provider by clicking the highlighted button.

To create a new Provider click the Add a Provider button. Fill in the form with your preferred values and click the Submit button. If the Provider is successfully created, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on a Provider you want to update. Change the values that you want and click the Update Provider button. If the Provider is successfully updated, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on a Provider you want to delete. To delete the chosen Provider click the Delete Provider button. If the Provider is successfully deleted, the following message is displayed.

Click the highlighted button on a Metric Type you want to delete. To delete the chosen Metric Type click the Delete Metric Type button. If the Metric Type is successfully deleted, the following message is displayed.
